sentences.sContent: The gobble sound, from the male turkeys, on the other hand, sounds exactly like you’d expect from the name and they do this all the time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The gobble sound, from the male turkeys, on the other hand, sounds exactly like you’d expect from the name and they do this all the time.
sentences.sCn: 另一方面来说，雄火鸡发出的咯咯声听上去绝对就是你从它们的名字就能预料到的那样，而火鸡一直如此。

remMethod.val: 来自gob(n. 一块， 大量)

trans.tranOther: the loud rapid gurgling sound made by male turkeys
